name: .ZSHEET File Extension
summary: Learn about .ZSHEET files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: To open the Zoho Sheet spreadsheet to which a ZSHEET file points, double-click the ZSHEET file from within Zoho WorkDrive Sync or WorkDrive TrueSync. If the shortcut the ZSHEET file contains is valid, the associated spreadsheet will open in Zoho Sheet.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
